page.title: 07 MUSIC
page.content:
A survey showed the following percentages for the popularity of certain types of music.The figures were as follows:
POP MUSIC - 10% OPERA MUSIC - 40% COUNTRY & WESTERN - 10% CLASSICAL - 10% 50's MUSIC - 20% 60's MUSIC - 10%
Amongst the large amount of individual pop groups mentioned by the participants,the following were the favourites:WHAM!,GO WEST,PAUL YOUNG,CULTURE CLUB,THE SEEKERS,KOOL & THE GANG,SPANDAU BALLET,THE BEETLES,ALED JONES,BEETHOVEN,TOMMY AND THE CAVEMEN,WEE WILLY HARRY and JOHNY RAYE.
